info.description: Billing client provides access to billing resources for Azure subscriptions.
info.title: BillingManagementClient

get.description: Lists the billing profiles that a user has access to. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement or Microsoft Partner Agreement.

parameters.description: May be used to expand the invoice sections.
parameters.name: $expand

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a billing profile by its ID. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement or Microsoft Partner Agreement.

parameters.description: May be used to expand the invoice sections.
parameters.name: $expand

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a billing profile. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement or Microsoft Partner Agreement.

parameters.description: The new or updated billing profile.
parameters.name: parameters

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result

Retry-After.description: Recommended time to wait before making another request to check the status of the operation. The time is specified in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

properties.description: The properties of the billing profile.

BillingProfileCreationRequest.description: The request parameters for creating a new billing profile.

billTo.description: The address of the individual or organization that is responsible for the billing profile.

displayName.description: The name of the billing profile.

enabledAzurePlans.description: Enabled azure plans for the billing profile.

invoiceEmailOptIn.description: Flag controlling whether the invoices for the billing profile are sent through email.

poNumber.description: The purchase order name that will appear on the invoices generated for the billing profile.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

BillingProfileProperties.description: The properties of the billing profile.

billingRelationshipType.description: Identifies which services and purchases are paid by a billing profile.

currency.description: The currency in which the charges for the billing profile are billed.

displayName.description: The name of the billing profile.

enabledAzurePlans.description: Information about the enabled azure plans.

hasReadAccess.description: Indicates whether user has read access to the billing profile.

indirectRelationshipInfo.description: Identifies the billing profile that is linked to another billing profile in indirect purchase motion.

invoiceDay.description: The day of the month when the invoice for the billing profile is generated.

invoiceEmailOptIn.description: Flag controlling whether the invoices for the billing profile are sent through email.

invoiceSections.description: The invoice sections associated to the billing profile. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

poNumber.description: The purchase order name that will appear on the invoices generated for the billing profile.

status.description: The status of the billing profile.

statusReasonCode.description: Reason for the specified billing profile status.

systemId.description: The system generated unique identifier for a billing profile.

targetClouds.description: Identifies the cloud environments that are associated with a billing profile. This is a system managed optional field and gets updated as the billing profile gets associated with accounts in various clouds.

IndirectRelationshipInfo.description: The billing profile details of the partner of the customer for an indirect motion.

billingAccountName.description: The billing account name of the partner or the customer for an indirect motion.

billingProfileName.description: The billing profile name of the partner or the customer for an indirect motion.

displayName.description: The display name of the partner or customer for an indirect motion.

properties.description: The properties of an invoice section.

InvoiceSectionProperties.description: The properties of an invoice section.

displayName.description: The name of the invoice section.

labels.description: Dictionary of metadata associated with the invoice section.

state.description: Identifies the state of an invoice section.

systemId.description: The system generated unique identifier for an invoice section.

tags.description: Dictionary of metadata associated with the invoice section. Maximum key/value length supported of 256 characters. Keys/value should not empty value nor null. Keys can not contain < > % & \ ? /

targetCloud.description: Identifies the cloud environments that are associated with an invoice section. This is a system managed optional field and gets updated as the invoice section gets associated with accounts in various clouds.

InvoiceSectionsOnExpand.description: The invoice sections associated to the billing profile. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

hasMoreResults.description: Indicates whether there are more invoice sections than the ones listed in this collection. The collection lists a maximum of 50 invoice sections. To get all invoice sections, use the list invoice sections API.

value.description: The invoice sections associated to the billing profile.
